alert.note: Alert for Western Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 11:43AM EST until December 16 at 1:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of two to three inches. * WHERE...Western Passaic County. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest totals are expected to be along the far western border with Sussex County. Snow is expected to change over to rain tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
